lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by reading about Grameen Bank in Bangladesh.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to help others.

lenders.name: People in the Coud
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the classic saying you can give a man a fish or you can teach him how to fish and feed him for life. Our business focuses on providing people living in third world countries the opportunities to work in virtual environments to sustain their livings.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an offshore recruitment agency. We hire employees in third world countries to work for clients in first world nations. This allows employees to earn above standard livings for their families, while providing cost cutting service for companies. Ultimately our goal is to provide a global community where workforce is not chosen on your location but the quality and skills of individual candidates.

lenders.name: Jilian
lenders.loan_because: I know that the people using these loans really appreciate the money they receive, and it's nice to be a part of that process.

lenders.name: Channing
lenders.loan_because: I may not have the most, but I sure don't have the least, and I don't want to take my opportunity to give for granted. Christ calls me to more.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans allow people an opportunity to realize their dreams of being an entrepreneur in a manner that preserves their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a connector and communicator.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to. I've received enough kindness in my 29 years of life from others. It's time I start giving some of it back.

lenders.name: Kinnion
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then.

lenders.name: bcmegan
lenders.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime." 
Chinese Proverb
lenders.occupational_info: Retired administrator

lenders.name: CHOBI
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Fashion

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want others to experience the joys of financial well-being and to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I engineer telecommunication networks.

lenders.name: Erickson Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my kids the importance of giving to help others, and that there are people in the world who live differently than us in the western world.  We make a loan twice a month, and the kids choose the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people invest their savings to provide for future needs.  I believe Kiva is a way to invest socially, with valuable social returns.

lenders.name: Diz
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to have so much more than many others in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from working on a ferry that carried people and cars between towns  here in Alaska

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference to people's lives.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: I think that microcredit can enable small entrepreneurs to live their dream and to have the chance of leading a better life!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student in a French business school, and I am currently working in the gas industry, more precisely in marketing for the Welding and Cutting segment.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: I want to run a selling perfumes business but now I don't have anything with me to start.I hope from this site I can get the loan for me to as my capital.I need $15500 for starting.
lenders.occupational_info: I will open a kiosk in KLCC. I choose the place because it's one of the busiest place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.occupation: Work for the Town of Frisco
lenders.loan_because: With just a little money, I can help someone else with their business and change their lives for the better!
lenders.occupational_info: During a typical day I repair and maintain the streets within the town, whether it be plowing snow during the winter or patching the road, replacing signs and cleaning the streets in the summer.

lenders.name: nick
lenders.loan_because: i am a beast
lenders.occupational_info: cause i feel good for people who have good ideas

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I am tall and I need my rep up because i stomp on too many people
lenders.occupational_info: Hard to see people, easy to squish, though

lenders.name: Stinsons Students
lenders.loan_because: My students are actually the ones raising the money for this loan!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social studies high school teacher who strives to reveal to my students the excitement and satisfaction of making connections with people of other cultures throughout the world!

lenders.loan_because: We can

lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels

lenders.loan_because: My students and I wanted to make a change.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: My sister found this wonderful organisation and I love the idea so much.  It seems a powerful way to enrich others while enriching ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Listening to doctors reports and typing them into legible format.  Helping students to learn this work.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: If I have the means to help anyone I will try my best.  Everyone should have some kind of opportunity to be successful in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard as a caterer to make sure my customers are satisfied in everyway.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because:
The loans I give here are in memory of my late husband Bob Raymer, who died in November 2008 of Alzheimer's Disease. He was deeply loved by so many people because his main purpose in life was to be of service to others. I can't think of a better way to honor his memory than to help others help themselves.

Also, giving to others is a wonderful way for me to "give back" to everyone who has helped me, whether financially or in other ways, through the years.

It's such a small world, we have to help one another. One life lifted lifts all lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired, which means I am no longer in the workforce; however, I keep busy with my writing and photography hobbies along with keeping in touch with my family and friends.

lenders.name: J-Florin
lenders.loan_because: i like helping people

lenders.name: prashant
lenders.loan_because: I think en-powering people is the best way of service we can do as individuals.

lenders.name: Hanny en Rob
lenders.loan_because: Lots of friends gave us credit to do so for our wedding anniversary!

lenders.name: simon
lenders.loan_because: through loaning, i make it possible for somebody to overcome a financial hurdle that would have otherwise impeded their progression in whatever endeavour they set out to do
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small scale businessman dealing in general supplies to both governmental and non governmental organisations

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies tell their stories better.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I think networks and one to one contact are very powerful so if enough people get involved with this and invite all their friends and contacts this could really make a difference. Plus if you help just one person it's got to be worth it. These people generally have the kind of attitude that offers the developing world its best chance to improve health and quality of life for all who are not as fortunate as many of us in the developed world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial planner, I advise people on how to plan their personal finances to meet their  long term goals in life from retiring in comfort to protecting their partner in case something happens to them to helping their children get a good education.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell their house themselves.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: each of us needs to give to others
lenders.occupational_info: I record the business transactions for my firms

lenders.name: J.A.D.E.
lenders.loan_because: We are a home schooling family and use Kiva to make a difference in the world and to teach our children the importance of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family that schools at home.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit is alive in all people. Expanding the opportunity for others to live self-directed and empowered lives is a mission of mine. Peer to peer lending, and the micro-finance systems behind it, will help millions of people improve their lives and provide opportunities for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a successful entrepreneur who would like to teach others how they can improve their businesses while creating a better world. I am available to be a mentor to those who are dedicated to skills building and are open to coaching. I passionately believe we live in an abundant world and it is our job to harness it safely and form global communities to share ideas and be a part of a new civilization; one that respects all forms of life and preserves our very existence as a species.

lenders.name: Humberto Ferreira
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we all live in the same planet and share the same fate
lenders.occupational_info: I try to spread fun and knowledge around...so I project and develop games for mobile platforms

lenders.loan_because: I can and I am grateful for what I have
lenders.occupational_info: I help publish books about technology, especially about the internet and these help people understand how it can be used and made better.

Student
Medicine
Economics

lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that we who have to give, should.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a partnership with a wonderful couple who have gifts that they are willing to share with new entrepreneurs around the globe and I am thankful that I am along for the journey.

lenders.occupational_info: Engineer, social worker, ethicist, future physician...most of all, an easily inspired adventurer.

lenders.loan_because: because I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: project management

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: I want my daughters to understand that even doing something small, such as loaning money or making a donation, can have a huge impact on other people's lives.

lenders.loan_because:
'cause Mr. when you're rattling on heaven's gate.
By then it is too late.
'cause Mr. when you get there,
They don't ask what you saved.
All they'll want to know Mr. is what you gave.  Ben Harper

lenders.name: Kit and Liz
lenders.loan_because: We are a fortunate couple wanting to give to people who are working to make better lives for themselves rather than waiting for bailouts or having a sense of entitlement.  Microfinance is an amazing process, and these people want to create their own luck - we want to help!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Kit sells wood flooring, while Liz is an oncology nurse.

 My ability to work is limited , so I love to encourage others to continually expand their abilities as I do!

~I also love to dance! ~

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in there needs bye you help me in sale.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help anyone i can , I'm actually here, no to get money back but to help those how might not have the Financial abilities as myself. I don't put off on anyone to do anything, I just want to help myself. Once i heard about what Kiva does, I thought it was the greatest opportunity for a average guy to make a  difference. If u have any questions or comments or just want to talk, feel free to email me, anytime. I would love to meet people on here and make "SMALL TEAMS". I'm not into making a huge 100 person team, i want it personable. Were everyone in the team is just that a team. If the rich, the powerful, won't change or help the world let us do it.

"Positive education activates consent elevation" - The Grave Diggaz

lenders.name: natalie
lenders.loan_because: this land is my land, this land is your land.
lenders.occupational_info: my job is to learn as much as i can.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is unacceptable.  I consider myself lucky to have an extra $25 in my wallet and would rather spend it towards helping someone get a head start, than purchase a "thing" that will just sit in my place.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a profound interest in political science and sociology.  I am a student and still learning how I can make use of my abilities to help alleviate poverty.

lenders.name: kccdo
lenders.loan_because: we are Serving The Villages in Uganda!
lenders.occupational_info:
KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION May 

BACKGROUND:
KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION (KCCDO), started way buck in 2007, wit vision of helping all the disadvantaged in the community,with knowledge and skills to lead equality of life.

 

 

 

KCCDO.is a registered organization by Community based organization(CBO),under the registered number CD-030-2009.

VISION:
Is to reach out all the community members of the different categories ie orphans, widows, women,youth, single mothers, grandmothers, school-drop-outs,care givers,elderly people and all that living with HIV/AIDS ,poor families,

 

 

 

 

 

MAJOR OBJECTIVES:
To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.

 Skills Training Program 
COMMUNITY VOCATIONAL CENTER,
VISION;
IS to promote peoples talents  &giving them skills for successful in life.

MISSION;

To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.

MOTTO;

IN GOD  WE TRUST.

COURSES PROVIDED;

-TAILORING COURSES, THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,

-KNITTING COURSES,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,

-HAIR DRESSING COURSES,THIS TAKES ONLY 1 YEAR

-SALOON MANAGEMENT,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR

-HAND-CRAFT COURSES,THIS TAKE 1 YEAR

AFTER THE COMPLETION OF THE COURSE  WE ARE WARDING A CERTIFICATE, FOR OUR TRAINEES.

TARGETED PEOPLE,

-WIDOWS
-WOMEN
-YOUTH
-SINGLE MOTHERS
-SCHOOL-DROP OUTS,
-ORPHANS
-HIV/AIDS AFFECTED,

YOU CAN JOIN US BY HELPING THIS NEEDY COMMUNITY MEMBERS WHO ARE IN NEED OF THE SKILLS, THROUGH YOUR DONATIONS,OR ANY ,OF THE FOLLOWING

NEEDS,

WE NEED 25 SEWING MACHINES.
WE NEED 5KNITTING MACHINES,
WE  NEED SALOON EQUIPMENTS,
WE NEED 25 COMPUTER MACHINES,
WE NEED 5 CARPENTRY TOOL- BOXES,
WE NEED 2 WELDING MACHINES(GRINDERS)


IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION OR need to be part  orCOMMENT YOU CAN CONTACT US ON .
TEL, +256,256,774530836/+256,785699626,
EMAIL, kccdo@yahoo.com





LOCATION:
(KCCDO) is located on guru road kasaala village luweero sub county luweero district
TEL: +256,774530836
EMAIL:kccdo@yahoo.com
site,http://kccdo.multiply.com/
CONTACT PERSON: Ibrahim Lubega.

I like to make loans to folks who do the same kinds of things I like to do: sewing, crafting, arts, cooking & baking!

lenders.name: Steve and Liz
lenders.loan_because: as Americans, we have privileges not always available to others. We feel a responsibility to share resources.
lenders.occupational_info: We are professional educators who take advantage of our summers off to see the world. We've seen hard working people in many countries and know our Kiva loans will make a difference.

lenders.name: Hope
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others make a living.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage conferences and events for an educational content provider

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: All we need
lenders.occupational_info: Share the learning with people

lenders.name: Koushik
lenders.loan_because: We (Archana and I) like to be fulfill someone's dream of self-sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales professional and a Graduate student

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Every person needs a chance to receive so that we can then pass on these gifts to others who can then be blessed and pass on these gifts to enrich the lives of others. The international community heals and becomes sustainable and  vibrant when we continue circulating these gifts and blessings from hand to hand in love and good will.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching English overseas because I learn so much from people in every culture. There is so much wisdom and kindness in this world. A little bit of God lives in each and every living being around this beautiful planet. Strangers are simply friends we have not met yet. I want to spend my life meeting and getting to know these new friends.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying the archaeology of the state of Wisconsin.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: it helps people out..
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We are all one family.

lenders.name: Paul and Juliet
lenders.loan_because: We thought it was such a wonderful idea, and doing it in memory of Millie and Pepper.

lenders.name: Seder 2009 Team
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people to have more freedom in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We celebrate holidays together and help each other in lots of ways.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: microfinancing works!
lenders.occupational_info: I study linguistics, which means that I am interested in studying the varieties of language across the world.

lenders.name: Edith & Carmine
lenders.loan_because: We believe that too many people are suffering needlessly because of the political, economic, and cultural mindset that there is not enough (of anything) to go around. This is utter nonsense. What is needed is to level the financial playing field because everyone in the world has a right to live well and with dignity.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
"A generous man will prosper; he who refreshes others will himself be refreshed." 

Proverbs 11:25 NIV

lenders.name: pat
lenders.loan_because: It is such a direct way of sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer at a school teaching English to former refugees  to New Zealand.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for entrepeneurs in other countries to receive the assistance they need. These loans change lives and to me that is more important than spending $25 on more clothes or purses that I really do not need more of.
lenders.occupational_info: Officially, they call my position a Library Page. But I work in Public Library performing Human Resources related tasks. I perform clerical work: answering phones, inputing data, photocopying, administrative support etc.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It leaves the recipients with their dignity intact and is a solution rather than a temporary fix like charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory and I troubleshoot equipment.

lenders.name: Tripology
lenders.occupation: We connect you with global travel specialists
lenders.loan_because:
We help people see the world.
We'd like to help the world be a better place to visit.
lenders.occupational_info: At Tripology (www.tripology.com), a Rand McNally service, we connect consumers with global travel specialists.

lenders.name: João
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small gestures make all the difference

lenders.name: Avideh
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all a big family and any man, woman or child in the world is part of my life.

lenders.loan_because: I want to support individuals who are striving to improve their own lives
lenders.occupational_info: Financial modeller & entrepreneur

lenders.name: Trudy
lenders.loan_because: I would like everybody to be able to have some control over their own lives.

lenders.name: aina
lenders.loan_because: I need loan to fund my internet business,very promising am good in it but i need $2,000 dollars to start my mini trading with zulutrade,some one please come to my aid,the loan will be paid back within 6months
lenders.occupational_info: Zulutrade,trade onbehalf off individuals,and it remmit back into the account after the close of the markets the gain,you can visit ninsfxconsult.zulutrade.com

lenders.name: Local Reuse
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do for the sake of alleviating poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Local Reuse is an online community where people donate and receive unwanted items within their neighborhood to keep useful products out of landfills.

lenders.name: Toshi
lenders.loan_because: Cooperation in you

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.name: sam
lenders.loan_because: because I don't like it when people are poor.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and encourage aspiring entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing

lenders.name: Clay Mason
lenders.loan_because: I know first hand the positive effects that can be generated through the micro loan process.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves and I enjoy seeing people make something out of nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesspeople connect across cultures.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful.

lenders.name: Bina
lenders.loan_because: I need to make a difference and reach out to as many as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My profession focuses on designing for print, web and interactive standalone exhibits/ kiosks.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: Karma happens, just paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping them figure out how to take care of people who can't afford medical care.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: No one deserves to go hungry.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time student.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hospitals improve how they provide care to patients and families.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in our human family.
lenders.occupational_info: I gather the information necessary to help veterans obtain compensation for their disabilities incurred by military service

lenders.name: Jerod
lenders.loan_because: I'm not sure of the exact quote, but give a man a fish, he eats for a day, show him how to fish, he eats for a lifetime.  To carry the metaphor further, I see this as a movement to enable that man or woman to buy the fishing pole.  I think micro loans are a nonpartisan and potentially permanent solution to assisting people out of poverty situations.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a state government agency.

lenders.name: Wilfried
lenders.loan_because: Perhaps others can put my money to better use.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the internet faster.

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: I design ads, coupons, logos... things that help promote someones services or products they may be trying to sell.

lenders.name: Ayn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people by giving them opportunities, motivation, and training (but not  handouts!). The Frontline podcast featuring Kiva introduced me to this amazing organization. I first studied microfinance in college and have believed  in its power since then. I admire all these entrepreneurs and want them to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. government and, even when the bureaucracy frustrates me, I still believe we are making a positive difference in this world. Outside of my "job" my "work" includes mentoring a teenager in foster care (www.kidsave.org), coaching kids with special needs (www.keengreaterdc.org), and teaching leadership to teenagers (www.ayf.com).

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is a small step in the direction that Jesus wants me to take.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and i help people find homes to live in.

lenders.name: Masanori
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am working at a private research insitute in Tokyo.  Space application and disaster management is my main field.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone have a chance to make a living.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: who will if we don't???

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an awesome way to empower people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large Canadian media company.  Most of the work I do is maintaining the technical operations and equipment.

lenders.name: Sridhar
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives and are willing to work hard for that.  I want to help people who are not looking for charity, just a helping hand until they are on their own.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: ..simply: It helps people. Period.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I believe to whom much is given much is expected.  In the US, we have no idea how very fortunate we are.   It is up to us given much to give back to keep the energy circulating and expanding.
lenders.occupational_info: 24/7 care and support of a disabled veteran

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.loan_because: I help people
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company that makes vitamin and health products. I also pastor a church and have several spiritual websites.

lenders.name: Pip
lenders.loan_because: Being a Kiva lender gives me an opportunity to 'return' some of the wonderful open-hearted hospitality that has been extended to me during my travels.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work from home with my own small business making and selling cloth menstrual pads (and other eco-friendly, reusable products that I purchased wholesale) by mail order and at our local market. In retirement I am enjoying more time for vegetable gardening and being involved in activities within my community such as choir, tutoring and bushwalking.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I'm excited to see people using their skills to support themselves and make the world a better place to live for all of us!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to work together.

lenders.name: AbdulRahiem
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help Muslims with overcoming hurdles, when trying to provide for themselves and their families, Insha'Allah.

lenders.occupational_info: I help develop websites and web applications that people use.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it helps people and is fun!

lenders.name: Caleb
lenders.loan_because: It's time for a revolution.

lenders.name: Corey
lenders.loan_because: I've needed loans in my life, I figure other people do as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook for people.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an international petroleum reservoir engineering consultant. I provide reservoir engineering, reservoir modelling and field development advice  to oil and gas companies. My work has given me the privilege of working with wonderful people from all over the world. Working with Kiva is my small way of saying thanks.
